Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ParameterDefinition documentation value length is longer than maximum specified length of 500 English Characters and 250 Arabic Characters

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Dosage text value length is longer than maximum specified length of 4000 English Characters and 2000 Arabic Characters

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Dosage.patientInstruction dataType SHALL have a maximum length of 4000  English Characters and 2000 Arabic Characters
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Dosage patientInstruction value length is longer than maximum specified length of 4000 English Characters and 2000 Arabic Characters

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Task description value length is longer than the maximum spefiied length of 2000 characters

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Bundle.type SHALL use the fixed value "message"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Bundle type is not using the specified fixed value "message"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Task.intent SHALL use the fixed value "order"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Task intent is not using the specified value "order"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.status SHALL use the fixed value "active"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Claim status is not using the specified value "active"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse.status SHALL use the fixed value "active"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse status is not using the specified value "active"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: In the priorauthorization profile the ClaimResponse.use SHALL use the fixed value "preauthorization"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse use is not using the specified value "preauthorization"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: In the claim profile the ClaimResponse.use SHALL use the fixed value "claim"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse status is not using the specified value "active"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse.use SHALL use the fixed value "claim"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse use is not using the specified value "claim"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: CommunicationRequest.status SHALL have the fixed value "active"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: CommunicationRequest status MUST have the fixed value "active"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: PaymentNotice.status SHALL use the fixed value "active"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: PaymentNotice status is not using the specified value "active"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: PaymentReconciliation.status SHALL use the fixed value "active"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: PaymentReconciliation status is not using the specified value "active"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: PaymentReconciliation.outcome SHALL use the fixed value "complete"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: PaymentReconciliation outcome is not using the specified value "complete"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Patient.active SHALL use the fixed value "active"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Patient active is not using the specified value "active"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Coverage.status SHALL use the fixed value "active"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Coverage status is not using the specified value "active"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Bundle.id SHALL be a globally unique identifier (GUID) with a pattern 36 characters (32 characters and 4 dashes ex: d45fe0ab-b138-4fc7-adbc-28f5c5a4fbf9)
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Bundle ID is not a valid GUID

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Attachment.data SHALL be provided if Attachment.url is not provided
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Attachment data is not provided when Attachment url is not used

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Attachment.url SHALL be provided if Attachment.data is not provided
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Attachment url is not provided when Attachment data is not used

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Attachment.size SHALL be provided if Attachment.url is provided
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Attachment size is not provided when Attachment url is used

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Attachment.hash SHALL be provided if Attachment.url is provided
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Attachment hash is not provided when Attachment url is used

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: OperationOutcome.id SHALL be a globally unique identifier (GUID) with a pattern 36 characters (32 characters and 4 dashes ex: d45fe0ab-b138-4fc7-adbc-28f5c5a4fbf9)
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Operation outcome id is invalid / not unique

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.extension.eligibilityOffLineDate SHALL be current date or less
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Claim eligibility OfflineDate is greater than current date

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.extension.authorizationOffLineDate SHALL be current date or less
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Claim authorization OfflineDate is greater than current date

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.extension.eligibilityOffLineDate SHALL exist if  Claim.extension.eligibilityOffLine is present
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Claim eligibility OfflineDate is required when Claim eligibility Offline is used

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.extension.authorizationOffLineDate SHALL exist if Claim.extension.authorizationOffLine is present
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Claim authorization OfflineDate is not used when Claim authorization Offline is used

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.provider SHALL refer to an organization where Organization.identifier is equal to the  MessageHeader.sender
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Claim provider does not refer to the provider in MessageHeader sender

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: PaymentReconciliation.detail.payee SHALL refer to an organization where Organization.identifier is equal to the MessageHeader.destination
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: PaymentReconciliation detail payee does not refer to the same provider included in MessageHeader destination

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: PaymentReconciliation.detail.submitter SHALL be a provider
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: PaymentReconciliation detail submitter is not a valid provider

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: PaymentReconciliation.paymentAmount.value SHALL be equal to the sum of PaymentReconciliation.detail.amount.value for all the listed details
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: PaymentReconciliation paymentAmount value is not equal to the sum of PaymentReconciliation detail amount value for all the listed details

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: PaymentReconciliation.detail.request SHALL exist if PaymentReconciliation.detail.paymentType is one of these values ( "Payment" ,"Adjustment")
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: PaymentReconciliation detail request is not provided when PaymentReconciliation detail paymentType is either "Payment" or "Adjustment"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: PaymentNotice.identifier SHALL refer to a successfully posted PaymentReconcililation.identifier
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: PaymentNotice identifier does not refer to a successfully posted PaymentReconciliation identifier

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: PaymentNotice MessageHeader.sender SHALL match the referenced PaymentReconciliation MessageHeader.destination
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: PaymentNotice MessageHeader sender does not match the referenced PaymentReconciliation MessageHeader destination

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: PaymentNotice.paymentDate SHALL be less than or equal to current date
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: PaymentNotice paymentDate cannot be in the future

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: PaymentNotice.payee SHALL match the MessageHeader.sender
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: PaymentNotice payee does not match the MessageHeader sender

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: PaymentNotice MessageHeader.destination SHALL be "NPHIES"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: PaymentNotice MessageHeader destination is not "NPHIES"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: PaymentReconciliation.created date SHALL be before or equal to the current date
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: PaymentReconciliation created date cannot be in the future

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: The PaymentReconciliation.detail.response.identifier SHALL refer to a successfully submitted ClaimResponse.identifier
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: PaymentReconciliation detail response identifier does not match the any valid ClaimResponse identifier

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: PaymentReconciliation.detail.date SHALL match the  related ClaimResponse.created
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: PaymentReconciliation detail date does not match the ClaimResponse created date

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.subtype SHALL only be "IP" when Claim.type="Institutional"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Claim subtype is using an incorrect value when Claim type is "Institutional"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.subtype SHALL be  "OP",  "EMR"  when Claim.type="Professional"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Claim subtype is using an incorrect value when Claim type is "Professional"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.subtype SHALL be  "OP" when Claim.type="oral"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Claim subtype is using an incorrect value when Claim type is "Dental"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.subtype SHALL be  "OP" when Claim.type="Vision"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Claim subtype is using an incorrect value when Claim type is "Vision"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.subtype SHALL be  "OP" when Claim.type="Pharmacy"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Claim subtype is using an incorrect value when Claim type is "Pharmacy"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.insurance.identifier is present, then Claim.insurance.identifier SHALL be same as the Claim.identifier when Claim.insurance.focal="true"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Claim insurance identifier and Claim identifier do not match when Claim insurance focal is "true" and Claim insurance identifier is used

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: PaymentReconciliation.detail.response SHALL exist if PaymentReconciliation.detail.paymentType is one of these values ( "Payment" ,"Adjustment")
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: PaymentReconciliation detail response is not found when PaymentReconciliation detail paymentType is either "Payment" or "Adjustment"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse.item.extension.adjudication-outcome SHALL be one of ("approved", "partial", "rejected", "not-required") when ClaimResponse.outcome="complete"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse item adjudication outcome "Pended" cannot be used when outcome is "Complete"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.item[n].detail exists and NOT a package, then, Claim.item[n].unitPrice SHALL be the sum of Claim.item[n].detail.unitPrice
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Invalid Claim item unitPrice value provided in a non-package Authorization / Claim request

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Batch.entry SHALL have maximum 101 elements including the MessageHeader and up to 100 claim requests
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Batch entry exceeds the maximum count of 100 claim request entries

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description:
If Claim.total.category exists then the sum of the Claim.item.adjudication.amount SHALL match the Claim.total.amount where Claim.item.adjudication.category = Claim.total.category
and ClaimResponse.outcome=”complete”
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The grand total of item category is not equal to the sum of items in each category when ClaimResponse outcome=”complete”

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: When ClaimResponse.use is either "preauthorization" or "claim", ClaimResponse.item.adjudication.category="benefit" SHALL be present if  ClaimResponse.outcome="complete"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse item adjudication category value is not "benefit" when ClaimResponse outcome is "complete"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: One and only one Claim.item.informationSequence referencing to "days-supply"  SHALL be used if the Claim.item.productOrService codesystem = "http://nphies.sa/terminology/CodeSystem/medication-codes" and the Claim.type="pharmacy" and when used for Claim.use="preauthorization" or "claim"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Claim supportingInfo of type "days-supply" is not linked or provided more than once in item when productOrService  is medication code in a "pharmacy" claim or authorization

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: PaymentNotice.provider SHALLL match the MessageHeader.sender
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: PaymentNotice provider and MessageHeder sender do not match

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: PaymentNotice.recipient SHALL be "NPHIES"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: PaymentNotice recipient is not "NPHIES" in the received payload

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Only one of Claim.extension.eligiblityResponse or Claim.extension.eligiblityOffLine SHALL be present
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Neither Claim eligbilityResponse nor Claim eligiblityOffLine was provided in the submitted claim request with eligibility check having been performed

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.extension.eligbility.OffLineDate SHALL be present when Claim.eligibility.OffLine exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Claim eligibilityOffLineDate is not provided when Claim eligibility OffLine is used

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.extension.eligibilityResponse SHALL contain a valid identifier that exists in NPHIES when present
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Claim eligibilityResponse is not found in NPHIES

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.extension.priorauthResponse SHALL contain a valid identifier that exists in NPHIES when present and Claim.use="claim"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Claim priorauthResponse is not found in NPHIES

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: MessageHeader.eventCoding SHALL be "claim-request" in each bundle entry within a batch claim request
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: MessageHeader eventCoding is not "claim-request" on the submitted bundle entry with the batch claim request

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Every entry in the batch entry.claim SHALL have an extension that contains the same batch-identifier and batch-period that match with the  batch-identifier and batch-period on all claims inside the same batch
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The batch-identifier or the batch-period of the submitted bundle claim entry does not match the batch-identifier or the batch-period in other bundle claim entries

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Each claim inside a batch bundle SHALL have a unique batch-number
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Each claim inside a batch bundle SHALL have a unique batch-number

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse.preAuthRef SHALL exist if the ClaimResponse.outcome = “complete” and ClaimResponse.use = “preauthorization or When the MessageHeader.eventCoding="prescriber-response"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse preAuthRef is not provided in a pre authorization resonse or prescriber response when ClaimResponse outcome is "complete"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse.preAuthPeriod SHALL exist if ClaimResponse.extension.adjudication-outcome is "approved" or "partial" and Claim.use="preauthorization" or "predetermination"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse preAuthPeriod is not provided in a authorization or predetermination response when ClaimResponse adjudication-outcome is "approved" or "partial"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: The Claim.prescription.display SHALL be mandatory if the Claim.item.productOrService codesystem = "http://nphies.sa/terminology/CodeSystem/medication-codes" and the claim.type is "pharmacy" when used for Claim.use="claim"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Name of the prescriber is required for dispensing medication

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: An extension either MUST have a value element, or it MUST contain another extension, but, it cannot be empty.
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: An empty extension is present in the submitted payload

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: When ClaimResponse.use is either "preauthorization" or "claim" and ClaimResponse.outcome="complete" then for each ClaimResponse.item, one ClaimResponse.item.adjudication.category with value "benefit" SHALL exist and the associated ClaimResponse.item.adjudication.amount SHALL be provided
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Benefit details are not provided when the outcome is complete

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: For each ClaimResponse.item each instance of ClaimResponse.item.adjudication.category SHALL be unique
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse itemd adjudication category is not unique for the supplied ClaimResponse item

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse.item.adjudication.reason SHALL be provided when ClaimResponse.extension.adjudication-outcome is either “rejected” or “partial”
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse item adjudication reason is not provided when ClaimResponse adjudication-outcome is either “rejected” or “partial”

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If every ClaimResponse.item.extension.adjudication-outcome=”approved” then ClaimResponse.extension.adjudication-outcome SHALL be “approved”
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse adjudication-outcome is using incorrect value when every ClaimResponse item adjudication-outcome is "approved"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If every ClaimResponse.item.extension.adjudication-outcome=”rejected” then ClaimResponse.extension.adjudication-outcome SHALL be “rejected”
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse adjudication-outcome is using incorrect value when every ClaimResponse item adjudication-outcome is "rejected"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If ClaimResponse.outcome=”queued” then ClaimResponse.extension.adjudication-outcome=”pended”
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse adjudication-outcome is using incorrect value when an ClaimResponse outcome is "pended"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If ClaimResponse.outcome=”error” then ClaimResponse.extension.adjudication-outcome SHALL NOT be included
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse adjudication-outcome is provided even when ClaimResponse outcome is "error"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse.extension.adjudication-outcome SHALL be “partial” for a ClaimResponse.item when its associated ClaimResponse.item.extension.adjudication-outcome = “partial” or is a mix between any combination of “approved”, “rejected” and “partial”
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse adjudication-outcome is using incorrect value when its associated ClaimResponse.item.extension.adjudication-outcome = “partial” or is a mix between any combination of “approved”, “rejected” and “partial”

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.duration.system MUST be present and refer to "http://unitsofmeasure.org" when VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.duration is used
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: VisionPrescription lensSpecification duration system is not provided

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.duration.value MUST be provided when VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.duration is used
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: VisionPrescription lensSpecification duration value is not provided

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.insurance contains more than one insurances, then one and only one of those insurances SHALL have Claim.insurance.focal =“true” and that insurance SHALL be the one for which the Claim request is being submitted
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Claim insurance focal usage is incorrect when multiple Claim insurances are used

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: A payment reconciliation SHALL be sent only when the associated claim response mentioned in PaymentReconciliation.detail.response has ClaimResponse.outcome=”complete”
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Payment reconciliation has been submitted for a Claim response which is not complete

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="info" then Claim.supportingInfo.valueString SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Supporting information "info" requires textual information

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="onset" then Claim.supportingInfo.code.coding.system SHALL exist and MUST refer to "http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/diagnosis-icd-10-am", and Claim.supportingInfo.timingDate SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Supporting information "onset" requires the starting date and the ICD 10 code for the symptoms / illness

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="attachment" then Claim.supportingInfo.valueAttachment SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Supporting information "attachment" requires the content to be provided

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="missingtooth" then Claim.supportingInfo.code.coding.system SHALL exist and MUST refer to "http://nphies.sa/terminology/CodeSystem/fdi-oral-region" and the Claim.supportingInfo.code.coding.code SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Supporting information "missingtooth" requires that the tooth be specified

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="missingtooth" and the reason code=”extraction” then Claim.supportingInfo.timingDate SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Supporting information "missingtooth" requires the actual or estimated date of the extraction

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="missingtooth" then Claim.supportingInfo.reason.coding.system SHALL exist and MUST refer to "http://nphies.sa/terminology/CodeSystem/missing-tooth-reason"  and the Claim.supportingInfo.reason.coding.code SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Supporting information "missingtooth" requires that a reason code for why the tooth is missing be provided

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="hospitalized" then Claim.supportingInfo.timingPeriod SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Supporting information "hospitalized" requires the period of hospitalization

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="employmentImpacted" then Claim.supportingInfo.timingPeriod SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Supporting information "employmentImpacted" requires the period during which the employment was impacted

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="lab-test" then Claim.supportingInfo.code.coding.system SHALL exist and MUST refer to "http://loinc.org" and Claim.supportingInfo.code.coding.code SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Supporting information "lab-test" requires a valid LOINC code

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="lab-test" then Claim.supportingInfo.valueQuantity SHALL exist and SHALL use a value specified in the system="http://unitsofmeasure.org"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: If supporting information is"lab-test" then valueQuantity SHALL exist and SHALL use a value specified in the UCUM code-system"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="reason-for-visit" then Claim.supportingInfo.code.coding.system SHALL exist and MUST refer to the system  ="http://nphies.sa/terminology/CodeSystem/visit-reason" and the Claim.supportingInfo.code.coding.code SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Supporting information "reason-for-visit" requires a value from the specified NPHIES CodeSystem mentioning the reason for the visit

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="days-supply" then Claim.supportingInfo.valueQuantity SHALL exist and SHALL use a value specified in the system="http://unitsofmeasure.org"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: If Supporting information is "days-supply" then valueQuantity SHALL exist and number of days SHALL use UCUM code “d”

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="vital-sign-weight"  and Claim.supportingInfo.valueQuantity exist then the Claim.supportingInfo.valueQuantity.system SHALL refer to "http://unitsofmeasure.org" and SHALL use code=kg
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: If Supporting information is "vital-sign-weight" and valueQuantity exist then it should use "kg" code from UCUM

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="vital-sign-systolic"  and Claim.supportingInfo.valueQuantity exist then the Claim.supportingInfo.valueQuantity.system SHALL refer to "http://unitsofmeasure.org" and SHALL  use code=mm[Hg]
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: If Supporting information is "vital-sign-systolic" and valueQuantity exist then it should use "mm[Hg]" code from UCUM system

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="vital-sign-diastolic"  and Claim.supportingInfo.valueQuantity exist then the Claim.supportingInfo.valueQuantity.system SHALL refer to "http://unitsofmeasure.org" and SHALL  use code=mm[Hg]
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: If Supporting information is "vital-sign-diastolic" and valueQuantity exist then it should use "mm[Hg]" code from UCUM system

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="vital-sign-height"  and Claim.supportingInfo.valueQuantity exist then the Claim.supportingInfo.valueQuantity.system SHALL refer to "http://unitsofmeasure.org" and SHALL use code=cm
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: If Supporting information is "vital-sign-height" and valueQuantity exist then it should use "cm" code from UCUM system

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="icu-hours" then Claim.supportingInfo.valueQuantity SHALL exist and Claim.supportingInfo.valueQuantity.system SHALL refer to "http://unitsofmeasure.org" and SHALL  use code= h
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: If Supporting information is "icu-hours" then valueQuantity shall exist and it should use "h" code from UCUM system

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="ventilation-hours" then Claim.supportingInfo.valueQuantity SHALL exist and Claim.supportingInfo.valueQuantity.system SHALL refer to "http://unitsofmeasure.org" and SHALL  use code= h
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: If Supporting information is "ventilation-hours" then valueQuantity shall exist and it should use "h" code from UCUM system

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.extension.authorizationOffLineDate is used then Claim.insurance.preAuthRef SHALL be present
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Claim insurance preAuthRef is required when Claim authorizationOfflineDate is provided

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: When validating claims from a batch then “batch-period” SHALL exist and SHALL be consistent across all entries in the batch
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: In a batch claim bundle, the batch-period is required and must be consistent across all entries in the batch

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.type="institutional" then, Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="vital-sign-weight" SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Supporting information code "vital-sign-weight" is required in an institutional claim request

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.type="institutional" then, Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="vital-sign-height" SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Supporting information code "vital-sign-height" is required in an institutional claim request

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.type="institutional" then, Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="vital-sign-systolic" SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display:
Supporting information code 
"vital-sign-systolic" is required in an institutional claim request

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.type="institutional" then, Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="vital-sign-diastolic" SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Supporting information code "vital-sign-diastolic" is required in an institutional claim request

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If CoverageEligibilityResponse.insurance exists then CoverageEligibilityResponse.extension.notInForceReason SHALL NOT be provided, else it SHALL be provided
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Incorrect inclusion / exclusion of CoverageEligibilityResponse notInForceReason is identified in the submitted message

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: For each CoverageEligibilityResponse.insurance, if CoverageEligibilityResponse.insurance.inforce=”true” then CoverageEligibilityResponse.insurance.extension.notInForceReason or SHALL NOT be provided, else it SHALL be provided
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Incorrect inclusion / exclusion of CoverageEligibilityResponse insurnace notInForceReason is identified in the submitted message

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="onset" then Claim.supportingInfo.code.coding.system SHALL exist and MUST refer to “http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icd-10-am” and Claim.supportingInfo.code.coding.code MUST exist and Claim.supportingInfo.timingDate SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Supporting information "onset" requires the starting date and the ICD 10 code for the symptoms / illness

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description:
If Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="chief-complaint" then for one array entry in Claim.supportingInfo.code.coding the  Claim.supportingInfo.code.coding.system SHALL exist and 
MUST refer to "http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icd-10-am" 
and Claim.supportingInfo.code.coding.code MUST exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Supporting information "chief-complaint" requires the ICD 10 code for the symptoms / illness if a code is supplied

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: PaymentReconciliation SHALL refer to a valid Claim transaction
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: PaymentReconciliation is referring to an incorrect Claim transaction

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: PaymentReconciliation SHALL refer to a valid ClaimResponse transaction
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: PaymentReconciliation is referring to an incorrect ClaimResponse transaction

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description:
For each PaymentReconciliation.detail the PaymentReconciliation.detail.response -> ClaimResponse.identifier = PaymentReconciliation.detail.request -> Claim.identifier

“->” means “references”
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The detail request and response SHALL refer to a Claim and ClaimResponse for that Claim

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.item.detail has children and not a package, then, Claim.item.detail.net SHALL be equal to the sum of Claim.item.detail.subDetail.net and not shadow billing
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Claim item detail net is not equal to the sum of Claim item detail subDetail net when Claim item package is "false", or does not exist in the message

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.item.detail has no children, or, is NOT a  package then Claim.item.detail.net SHALL be equal to ((claim.item.detail.quantity * Claim.item.detail.unitPrice) * Claim.item.detail.factor) + Claim.item.detail.extension.tax). If factor is missing, its value =1. if tax is missing, its value=0
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: If Claim item detail has no children or is not a package then Claim Item detail net must be equal to ((quantity * unit price) * factor) + tax

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.item.detail.subDetail.net SHALL be equal to ((claim.item.detail.subDetail.quantity * Claim.item.detail.subDetail.unitPrice) * Claim.item.detail.subDetail.factor) + Claim.item.detail.subDetail.extension.tax). If factor is missing, its value =1. if tax is missing, its value=0
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Claim Item detail subDetail net must be equal to ((quantity * unit price) * factor) + tax

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Task.lastModified SHALL be greater than or equal to Task.created date
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Task lastModified date shall be greater than or equal to Task created date

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Either CoverageEligibilityRequest.servicedDate or CoverageEligibilityRequest.servicedPeriod SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The service date or service period is missing

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Either Claim.item.servicedDate or Claim.item.servicedPeriod SHALL exist, but, not both
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The service date or service period is missing

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.item.servicedDate SHALL not be present when Claim.item.period is used
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: If period is provided then servicedDate must not be used

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.item.period SHALL not be present when Claim.item.servicedDate is used
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: If servicedDate is provided then period must not be used

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Communication.contentAttachment.size is supplied then SHALL be a positive integer having value between 1 Byte to 10 Megabytes
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: attachment size value must be a positive integer and between 1 Byte to 10 Megabytes

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description:
Claim.item.careTeamSequence value SHALL 
match an existing Claim.careTeam.sequence value within the same claim
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: the item careteamSequence does not match an existing careteam sequence entry within the same claim

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: For item supportingInfoSequence SHALL match an existing supportingInfo.sequence within the same claim
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: the supportingInfoSequence does not match an existing supportingInfo sequence entry within the same claim

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: For item diagnosisSequence SHALL match an existing  diagnosis.sequence within the same claim
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: the diagnosisSequence does not match an existing diagnosis sequence entry within the same claim

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Cancel request for the related claim request for which a cancellation response has been received with Task.status="completed"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The referenced transaction has already been cancelled

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: A cancellation has already been issued for this message
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: A cancellation has already been issued for this message

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Response MessageHeader.sender SHALL be the same of Request MessageHeader.destination.reciever
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Details of sender in the response message do not match the related request message destination receiver details

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Request MessageHeader.sender SHALL be the same of Response MessageHeader.destination.reciever
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Details of sender in the request message do not match the related response message destination receiver details

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.extension.priorauthResponse is used then Claim.insurance.preAuthRef SHALL be present
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The prior authorization reference number is required on the claim when authorization has been approved

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: When the ClaimResponse.adjudication.category="eligible" then the ClaimResponse.adjudication.amount SHALL be less than or equal to the ClaimResponse.adjudication.amount where ClaimResponse.adjudication.category="submitted"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The eligible amount shall be less than or equal to the submitted amount

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: When validating claims from a batch then “batch-identifier” SHALL exist and SHALL be consistent across all entries in the batch
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: In a batch claim bundle, the batch-identifier is required and must be consistent across all entries in the batch

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: When validating claims from a batch then batch-extensions SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: In a batch claim bundle, the batch-extensions are required and must be consistent across all entries in the batch

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.supportingInfo.sequence  SHALL be unique within the claim request
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Claim supportingInfo sequence value is not unique within the claim request

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.diagnosis.sequence SHALL be unique within the claim request
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Claim diagnosis sequence value is not unique within the claim request

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Communication.basedOn SHALL refer to an existing communication request
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Communication response must refer to an existing communication request

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: MessageHeader.destination.receiver SHALL be "NPHIES" when MessageHeader.eventCoding.code is one of "poll-request", "payment-notice".
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Message receiver must be "NPHIES" when message is either a poll request or a payment notice

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Each new Claim request SHALL have a globally unique Claim.identifier
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Claim identifier must be unique

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse.item.adjudication.amount currency SHALL be "SAR"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Item adjudication amount currency must be "SAR"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Rule Related Message/Resource/Element: Status Response to Claim status request
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: The target message in the status check request could not be found
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The target message in the status check request could not be found

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: VisionPrescription.created SHALL be on or before Claim.created
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Vision prescription created date cannot be after the claim created date

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: VisionPrescription.dateWritten SHALL be on or before Claim.created
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Vision prescription dateWritten date cannot be after the claim created date

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.insurance.preAuthRef exists where Claim.insurance.focal="true" then either Claim.extension.authorizationOffLineDate or Claim.extension.priorauthResponse SHALL be provided
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: When preAuthRef is used then either authorizationOffLineDate or priorauthResponse must be provided

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse.extension.adjudication-outcome SHALL be one of ("approved", "partial", "rejected", "not-required") when ClaimResponse.outcome="complete"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse adjudication outcome "Pended" cannot be used when outcome is "Complete"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: The Task.status.reason="claimed" SHALL NOT be used when the payer is sending a cancellation rejection reason for a claim cancellation request
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Cancellation rejection reason cannot be "claimed" when the cancellation response is for a claim

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: VisionPrescription.lensSpecification.eye SHALL be unique within the prescription
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Cannot specify the same eye twice

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Task.reasonCode in the response SHALL be the same as the Task.reasonCode in the request
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Task reasonCode in the response SHALL be the same as the Task reasonCode in the request

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Task.reasonCode SHALL be used only when the Task.code is one of ("cancel", "nullify")
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The reasonCode can be used only in a cancellation request

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: VisionPrescription resource SHALL exist only when MessageHeader.eventCoding=”claim-request” or  “priorauth-request” and Claim.type.coding.code=”vision” or “institutional”
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: VisionPrescription resource can be used only if claim or authorization request type is "vision" or "institutional"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: PaymentNotice.amount SHALL contain zero or a positive value
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The amount field must contain zero or a positive value

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: PaymentReconciliation.paymentAmount SHALL contain zero or a positive value
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The paymentAmount field must contain zero or a positive value

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Task.lastModified SHALL be less than or equal to current date
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Task lastModified date cannot be in the future

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Nphies does not allow a non-supported modifier extension
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Message contains a non-supported modifier extension

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.item.extension.payerShare SHALL be equal or less than the Claim.item.net
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The payerShare cannot be greater than item net

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.item.extension.patientShare SHALL be equal or less than the Claim.item.net
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The patientShare cannot be greater than item net

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.item.extension.payerShare is supplied then the sum of Claim.item.extension.payerShare and Claim.item.extension.patientShare SHALL be equal to Claim.item.net
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The sum of payerShare and patientShare must equal to item net

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description:
The PaymentReconciliation transaction receiver SHALL be the claim submitter when the 
ClaimResponse.payeeType.coding.code="provider" and the receiver SHALL be Claim.payee.party when  the ClaimResponse.payeeType.coding.code="other"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display:
The PaymentReconciliation transaction receiver SHALL be the claim submitter when the 
ClaimResponse payeeType="provider" and the receiver SHALL be the Claim payee party when  the ClaimResponse payeeType="other"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.diagnosis.coding.code can be "admitting" ONLY if Claim.type="institutional" and Claim.subtype="ip" and Claim.use="claim"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The diagnosis code can be "admitting" only for an inpatient claim

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.diagnosis.coding.code can be "discharge" ONLY if Claim.type="institutional" and Claim.subtype="ip" and Claim.use="claim"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The diagnosis code can be "discharge" only for an inpatient claim

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: PaymentReconciliation.detail.amount SHALL be equal to the sum of PaymentReconciliation.detail.extension.component-payment, PaymentReconciliation.detail.extension.component-early-fee and  PaymentReconciliation.detail.extension.component-nphies-fee
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Detail amount SHALL be = component-payment + component-early-fee + component-nphies-fee

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse.item.extension.adjudication-outcome SHALL be provided if ClaimResponse.outcome="complete"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The item adjudication-outcome is missing

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: When Patient.identifier.system="http://nphies.sa/identifier/passportnumber" then Patient.identifier.extension.country SHALL be provided
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Patient's passport issuing country is not provided

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.item.factor SHALL be a positive decimal value
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Item factor must be a positive decimal value

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: The purpose of the eligibility response transaction SHALL match the purpose of the related eligibility request.
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The purpose of the eligibility response transaction must match the purpose of the related eligibility request.

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: The Claim.item.subSite SHALL not be allowed if the Claim.item.bodySite is not provided
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The subSite shall not be allowed if the bodySite is not provided

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: When Claim.payeeType.coding.code="other" then the Claim.payee.party SHALL be provided
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The payee party element is required when payeeType is “other”

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="temperature"  and Claim.supportingInfo.valueQuantity exist then the Claim.supportingInfo.valueQuantity.system SHALL refer to "http://unitsofmeasure.org" and SHALL  use code=cel
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: If Supporting information is "temperature" and valueQuantity exist then it should  use "Cel" code from UCUM

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="pulse"  and Claim.supportingInfo.valueQuantity exist then the Claim.supportingInfo.valueQuantity.system SHALL refer to "http://unitsofmeasure.org" and SHALL  use code=/min
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: If Supporting information is "pulse" and valueQuantity exist then it should  use "/min" code from UCUM

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="oxygen-saturation"  and Claim.supportingInfo.valueQuantity exist then the Claim.supportingInfo.valueQuantity.system SHALL refer to "http://unitsofmeasure.org" and SHALL  use code=% and Claim.supportingInfo.valueQuantity.value SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: If Supporting information is "oxygen-saturation" and valueQuantity exist then it should  use "%" code from UCUM

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="respiratory-rate"  and Claim.supportingInfo.valueQuantity exist then the Claim.supportingInfo.valueQuantity.system SHALL refer to "http://unitsofmeasure.org" and SHALL  use code=/min
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: If Supporting information is "respiratory-rate" and valueQuantity exist then it should  use "/min" code from UCUM

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="last-menstrual-period" then Claim.supportingInfo.timingDate SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Supporting information "last-menstrual-period" requires the date of start of last menstrual period.

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: PaymentReconciliation.requestor and PaymentReconciliation.detail.payee SHALL refer to the same provider organization
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: PaymentReconciliation requestor and PaymentReconciliation detail payee are not referring to the same provider organization

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: The Claim.payee.type and the ClaimResponse.payeeType SHALL be one of (“provider”, “other”)
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The payee type can only be one of (“provider”, “other”) in a claim or claim response

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: The ClaimResponse.payeeType SHALL NOT be "other" when the Claim.payee.type is not "other"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The claim response payeeType value cannot be "other" if the corresponding claim payee type value is not "other"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.payee.party SHALL be used only when Claim.payee.type="Other"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Claim payee party must not provided when Claim payee type value is not "other"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Rule Related Message/Resource/Element:
MessageHeader.destination.receiver in
PaymentReconciliation transaction and ClaimResponse.payeeType
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: For a payment reconciliation transaction, if the corresponding ClaimResponse.payeeType="provider", then the MessageHeader.destination.receiver in the payment reconciliation bundle SHALL match the corresponding ClaimResponse.requestor
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The payee of the included claim payment does not match the payee of a payment reconciliation

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Rule Related Message/Resource/Element:
MessageHeader.destination.receiver in
PaymentReconciliation transaction and ClaimResponse.payeeType
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: For a payment reconciliation transaction, if the corresponding ClaimResponse.payeeType="other", then the MessageHeader.destination.receiver in the payment reconciliation bundle SHALL match the corresponding Claim.payee.party
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The payee of the included claim payment does not match the payee of a payment reconciliation

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse.item.adjudication.category="tax" SHALL be present when ClaimResponse.outcome="complete" and ClaimResponse.use="claim"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse.item.adjudication.category="tax" SHALL be present when ClaimResponse.outcome="complete" and ClaimResponse.use="claim"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse.item.adjudication.category="approved-quantity" SHALL be present when  ClaimResponse.outcome="complete" and ClaimResponse.use="claim"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse.item.adjudication.category="approved-quantity" SHALL be present when  ClaimResponse.outcome="complete" and ClaimResponse.use="claim"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse.item.adjudication.category="approved-quantity" SHALL be present if  ClaimResponse.outcome="complete" and ClaimResponse.use="preauthorization"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse.item.adjudication.category="approved-quantity" SHALL be present if  ClaimResponse.outcome="complete" and ClaimResponse.use="preauthorization"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse.item.adjudication.category="tax" SHALL NOT be provided when ClaimResponse.outcome="complete" and ClaimResponse.use="preauthorization"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse.item.adjudication.category="tax" SHALL NOT be provided when ClaimResponse.outcome="complete" and ClaimResponse.use="preauthorization"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.item.informationSequence SHALL be provided when the Claim.supportingInfo is supplied
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The claim item informationSequence is not valid

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.item.informationSequence SHALL be unique within the Claim.item
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Claim item informationSequence is not unique within the Claim item

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: CoverageEligibiltyResponse.extension.siteEligibility SHALL be provided when CoverageEligibiltyResponse.outcome="complete"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The siteEligibility is required when outcome is "complete"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description:
CoverageEligibilityResponse.error
SHALL be provided when CoverageEligibiltyResponse.outcome="error"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The error details are required when outcome is "error"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse.error SHALL be provided when ClaimResponse.outcome="error"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The error details are required when outcome is "error"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.extension.newborn = "true" and the Claim.type="institutional" then the "birth-weight" (Claim.supportingInfo.category= "birth-weight" ) SHALL be provided
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display:
The birth-weight details are required for a newborn patient in an institutional 
claim / preauthorization request

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.extension.newborn = "true" and the Claim.type="professional" then the "birth-weight" (Claim.supportingInfo.category= "birth-weight" ) SHALL be provided
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display:
The birth-weight details are required for a newborn patient in a professional
type request

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.extension.transfer  SHALL NOT be provided when Claim.use="claim" or "predetermination"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The transfer extension cannot be used in a claim or predetermination transaction

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="birth-weight" then Claim.supportingInfo.valueQuantity SHALL exist and Claim.supportingInfo.valueQuantity.system SHALL refer to "http://unitsofmeasure.org" and SHALL  use code=kg
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: If Supporting information is "birth-weight" then valueQuantity shall exist and should use "kg" code from UCUM

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: PaymentNotice.paymentDate SHALL be on or after the PaymentReconciliation.paymentDate.
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: PaymentNotice paymentDate SHALL be on or after the PaymentReconciliation paymentDate

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Patient.identifier.type SHALL be "MR" only when CoverageEligiblityRequest.extension.newborn="true"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Patient identifier type can be "MR" only for a newborn patient

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Patient.identifier.type SHALL be "MR" only when Claim.extension.newborn="true"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Patient identifier type can be "MR" only for a newborn patient

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse.outcome SHALL be "complete" in all subsequent responses following the first response with ClaimResponse.outcome="complete"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The outcome value must be "complete" in the response following the first response with outcome = "complete"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: CommunicationRequest.recipient SHALL be a provider organization
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: CommunicationRequest recipient must be a provider organization

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: CommunicationRequest.sender SHALL be a payer organization
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: CommunicationRequest sender must be a payer organization

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: CommunicationRequest.recipient SHALL match the MessageHeader.receiver
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: CommunicationRequest recipient must match the MessageHeader receiver

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: CommunicationRequest.sender SHALL match the MessageHeader.sender
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: CommunicationRequest sender must match the MessageHeader sender

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description:
If Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="chief-complaint" 
then Claim.supportingInfo.code.coding or Claim.supportingInfo.code.text or both SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: For chief-complaint a code and/or text must be supplied

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: When ClaimResponse.item.adjudication.category.coding.code = "approved-quantity" or "approved-duration" then only ClaimResponse.item.adjudication.value SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: If ClaimResponse item adjudication category is "approved-quantity" or "approved-duration"then only an adjudication value must be provided

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse.item.noteNumber SHALL refer to an exisiting ClaimResponse.processNote.number within the same resource
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: An item noteNumber shall refer to an exisiting processNote number within the same resource

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse.item.noteNumber SHALL be unique within the item array
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The item noteNumber shall be unique within the list of items

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse.item.detail.noteNumber SHALL be unique within the item array
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The item detail noteNumber shall be unique within the list of items

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse.item.detail.subDetail.noteNumber SHALL be unique within the item array
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The item subdetail noteNumber shall be unique within the list of items

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse.processNote.number SHALL be unique within the processNote array
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse processNote number shall be unique within the list of processNotes

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Rule Related Message/Resource/Element: Claim Response for Cancelled claim request
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: A claim response SHALL not be sent to a claim request that has already been cancelled
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: You cannot send a claim response to a claim request that has been cancelled

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: The System must be unique within the same array
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The System must be unique within the same array

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Only one system from the specified ValueSet SHALL appear within the same array
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Only one system from the specified ValueSet SHALL be specified for the element

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse.item.detail.noteNumber SHALL refer to an exisiting ClaimResponse.processNote.number within the same resource
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: An item detail noteNumber shall refer to an exisiting processNote number within the same resource

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse.item.detail.subDetail.noteNumber SHALL refer to an exisiting ClaimResponse.processNote.number within the same resource
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: An item subdetail noteNumber shall refer to an exisiting processNote number within the same resource

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.supportingInfo.category.code.coding is not "chief-complaint" and Claim.supportingInfo.code exists then Claim.supportingInfo.code.coding SHALL be provided
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: If supportingInfo code element is provided and the category is not "chief-complaint" then a code is required

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.supportingInfo.category.code.coding="chief-complaint"then Claim.supportingInfo.code SHALL be provided
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The supportingInfo code element is required if supportingInfo category is “chief-complaint”

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: MessageHeader.id is a duplicate
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The MessageHeader id has been found in a previous message, it is a duplicate

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Bundle.id is a duplicate
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The Bundle id has been found in a previous message, it is a duplicate

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: The ClaimResponse.item.extension.patientInvoice SHALL match the Claim.item.extension.patientInvoice in the corresponding Claim request, if the  Claim.item.extension.patientInvoice exists
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The patientInvoice in the ClaimResponse does not match any patientInvoice in the related Claim request

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: The CoverageEligibiltyResponse.extension.siteEligibility value SHALL not be "eligible" if for every array entry of CoverageEligibiltyResponse.insurance the related CoverageEligibilityResponse.insurance.inforce value is "false"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The siteEligibility field cannot have a value "eligible" if all provided insurances are not in force

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: The CoverageEligibilityResponse.error SHALL be provided when CoverageEligibilityResponse.outcome= “error”
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The CoverageEligibilityResponse error is required when CoverageEligibilityResponse outcome= “error”

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse.item.extension.patientInvoice SHALL be required when Claim.item.extension.patientInvoice is provided
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The patientInvoice in the claim response is required when the corresponding claim request contains patientInvoice as well

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: CoverageEligibilityRequest.status SHALL use the fixed value “active”
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: CoverageEligibilityRequest status is not using the specified value "active"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: CoverageEligibilityResponse.status SHALL use the fixed value “active”
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: CoverageEligibilityResponse status is not using the specified value "active"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If the Bundle.id and content are reused then the MessageHeader.id in the original message SHALL be reused
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: If the Bundle id and content are reused then the MessageHeader id in the original message SHALL be reused

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: CoverageEligibilityRequest.provider SHALL refer to an organization where Organization.identifier is equal to the  MessageHeader.sender
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: CoverageEligibilityRequest provider does not refer to the provider in MessageHeader sender

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: NPHIES has already received  and is currently processing a message for which this message is a duplicate
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: NPHIES has already received and is currently processing a message for which this message is a duplicate

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: The MessageHeader.eventCoding in the response is not compatible with  the MessageHeader.eventCoding in the request
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The MessageHeader eventCoding in the response is not compatible with  the MessageHeader eventCoding in the request

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: The MessageHeader.response.identifier SHALL point to the related request MessageHeader.id for a real time response
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The MessageHeader response identifier must point to the related request MessageHeader id

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: This MessageHeader.eventCoding cannot be sent by an HIC/HCP
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: This MessageHeader eventCoding cannot be sent by an HIC/HCP

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: When Claim.extension.transfer = "true" in an authorization request and ClaimResponse.outcome =  "complete"  and  ClaimResponse.extension.adjudication-outcome is "approved" or "partial in the related authorization response then the  ClaimResponse.extension.transferAuthorizationNumber SHALL be provided
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: When the authorization request is for a transfer and the related authorization response is complete and the adjudication outcome is approved or partial then transferAuthorizationNumber in the response is required

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: When Claim.extension.transfer = "true" in an authorization request and ClaimResponse.outcome = "complete"  and  ClaimResponse.extension.adjudication-outcome is "approved" or "partial in the related authorization response then the ClaimResponse.extension.transferAuthorizationPeriod SHALL be provided
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: When the authorization request is for a transfer and the related authorization response is complete and the adjudication outcome is approved or partial then transferAuthorizationPeriod in the response is required

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse.extension.transferAuthorizationNumber SHALL not be provided if in the related claim request the Claim.extension.transfer does not exist or Claim.extension.transfer not = "true"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse transferAuthorizationNumber cannot be supplied if the related request is not for a transfer

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse.extension.transferAuthorizationPeriod SHALL not be provided if in the related claim request the Claim.extension.transfer does not exist or Claim.extension.transfer not = "true"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse transferAuthorizationPeriod cannot be supplied if the related request is not for a transfer

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse.extension.transferAuthorizationProvider SHALL not be provided if in the related claim request the Claim.extension.transfer does not exist or Claim.extension.transfer not = "true"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse transferAuthorizationProvider cannot be supplied if the related request is not for a transfer

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If ClaimResponse.extension.transferAuthorizationProvider is supplied and referring to a Practitioner resource instance in the message then Practitioner.name SHALL be provided
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: If transferAuthorizationProvider is a Practitioner then the  Practitioner name must be supplied

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If ClaimResponse.extension.transferAuthorizationProvider is supplied and referring to a Organization resource instance in the message then Organization.name SHALL be provided
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: If transferAuthorizationProvider is an Organization then the  Organization name must be supplied

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description:
When Claim.extension.newborn = "true" and Claim.item.servicedDate is provided then the count of days between Claim.item.servicedDate and Patient.birthDate related to the newborn SHALL be less than or equal to 90 days 

(Claim.item.servicedDate - Patient.birthDate <=90 days)
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The Claim item servicedDate must be less than or equal to 90 days from the date of birth of the newborn child

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description:
if CoverageEligibilityRequest.extension.newborn = "true" and CoverageEligibilityRequest.servicedDate is provided then the count of days between CoverageEligibilityRequest.servicedDate and Patient.birthDate related to the newborn SHALL be less than or equal to 90 days 

(CoverageEligibilityRequest.servicedDate - Patient.birthDate <=90 days)
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The Eligibility servicedDate must be less than or equal to 90 days from the date of birth of the newborn child

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description:
if CoverageEligibilityRequest.extension.newborn = "true" and CoverageEligibilityRequest.servicedPeriod is provided then the count of  days between CoverageEligibilityRequest.servicedPeriod.end and Patient.birthDate related to the newborn SHALL be less than or equal to 90 days 

(CoverageEligibilityRequest.servicedPeriod.end - Patient.birthDate  <=90 days)
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The Eligibility servicedPeriod end date must be less than or equal to 90 days from the date of birth of the newborn child

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description:
When Claim.extension.newborn = "true" and Claim.item.servicedPeriod is provided then the count of days between Claim.item.servicedPeiod.end and Patient.birthDate related to the newborn SHALL be less than or equal to 90 days 

(Claim.item.servicedPeriod.end - Patient.birthDate <=90 days)
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The Claim item servicedPeriod end date must be less than or equal to 90 days from the date of birth of the newborn child

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: When Claim.extension.newborn = "true"  then for one array entry of the Claim.diagnosis the Claim.diagnosis.diagnosisCodeableConcept.coding.code must be one of the Z38.x ICD-10-AM codes
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: One of the Z38.x codes is required as a  diagnosis in the authorization / claim request

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: The CoverageEligibiltyResponse.extension.siteEligibility value SHALL not be "eligible" if no insurance element is provided
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The CoverageEligibiltyResponse siteEligibility value SHALL not be "eligible" if no insurance element is provided

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: The CoverageEligibiltyResponse.extension.siteEligibility value SHALL be "eligible" if at least in one array entry of CoverageEligibiltyResponse.insurance the related CoverageEligibilityResponse.insurance.siteEligibility is "eligible"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The siteEligibility field must have a value "eligible" when at least one of the related insurance(s) is covered under site eligibility

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: The CoverageEligibiltyResponse.insurance.extension.siteEligibility SHALL not be "eligible" if the related CoverageEligibilityResponse.insurance.inforce value is "false"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The siteEligibility field cannot have a value "eligible" when related insurance is not inforce

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: The CoverageEligibiltyResponse.extension.siteEligibility value SHALL not be "eligible" if for every array entry of CoverageEligibiltyResponse.insurance the related CoverageEligibilityResponse.insurance.siteEligibility is not "eligible"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The CoverageEligibilityResponse siteEligibility field cannot have a value "eligible" when none of the related insurance(s) is covered under site eligibility

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: When Claim.extension.transfer = "true" in an authorization request and ClaimResponse.outcome = "complete"  and  ClaimResponse.extension.adjudication-outcome is "approved" or "partial in the related authorization response then the  ClaimResponse.extension.transferAuthorizationProvider SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: When the authorization request is for a transfer and the related authorization response is complete and the adjudication outcome is "approved" or "partial" then transferAuthorizationProvider must be supplied

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Only one of CommunicationRequest.payload.contentString, CommunicationRequest.payload.contentAttachment or CommunicationRequest.payload.contentReference SHALL exist when CommunicationRequest.payload.content[x] is used
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Only one of contentString, contentAttachment or contentReference can be used when payload content is provided

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Only one of Communication.payload.contentString, Communication.payload.contentAttachment or Communication.payload.contentReference SHALL exist when CommunicationRequest.payload.content[x] is used
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Only one of contentString, contentAttachment or contentReference can be used when payload content is provided

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If data type is Ref4 then either display or (type with identifier) SHALL be provided
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Prescriber display or (prescriber identifier and identifer type)SHALL be provided

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preAuthorization- reissue-reason SHALL be provided if the same PreAuthRef was provided by the same payer to the same patient and same provider in a previous advanced Authorization
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preAuthorization- reissue reason SHALL be provided if the same PreAuthRef was provided by the same payer to the same patient and same provider in a previous advanced Authorization

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: The ClaimResponse.extension.reissue-reason value "cancel" SHALL be used only for advanced preauthorization
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The reissue reason value "cancel" can be used only for advanced preauthorization

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preAuthorization- service provider shall be same as receiver in message header
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preAuthorization- service provider shall be same as receiver in message header

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preAuthorization- ClaimResponse.use SHALL use the fixed value "preauthorization"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preAuthorization- ClaimResponse use can only use the fixed value "preauthorization"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preAuthorization- ClaimResponse.outcome SHALL use only "complete"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preAuthorization - ClaimResponse outcome can only be "complete"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preAuthorization- addItem diagnosis sequence is required if ClaimResponse type is pharmacy
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preAuthorization- addItem diagnosis sequence is required if claim response type is pharmacy

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preAuthorization- noteNumber shall correspond to an existing process note number in the payload
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preAuthorization- noteNumber shall correspond to an existing process note number in the payload

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preAuthorization- ClaimResponse.item.adjudication.category="approved-quantity" SHALL be present when  ClaimResponse.outcome="complete"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preAuthorization- ClaimResponse item adjudication.category "approved-quantity" SHALL be present when  ClaimResponse.outcome is "complete"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.valueString SHALL have maximum length of 250 English characters and 125 Arabic characters
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - ClaimResponse supportingInfo valueString value length is longer than the maximum specified length of 250 English characters and 125 Arabic characters

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - If ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="info" then ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.valueString SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - Supporting information "info" requires textual information

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - If ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="attachment" then ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.valueAttachment SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - Supporting information "attachment" requires the content to be provided

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - If ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="missingtooth" then ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.code.coding.system SHALL exist and MUST refer to "http://nphies.sa/terminology/CodeSystem/fdi-oral-region" and the ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.code.coding.code SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - Supporting information "missingtooth" requires that the tooth be specified

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - If ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="missingtooth" and the reason code=”extraction” then ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.timingDate SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - Supporting information "missingtooth" requires the actual or estimated date of the extraction

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - If ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="missingtooth" then ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.reason.coding.system SHALL exist and MUST refer to "http://nphies.sa/terminology/CodeSystem/missing-tooth-reason"  and the ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.reason.coding.code SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - Supporting information "missingtooth" requires that a reason code for why the tooth is missing be provided

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - If ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="hospitalized" then ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.timingPeriod SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - Supporting information "hospitalized" requires the period of hospitalization

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - If ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="employmentImpacted" then ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.timingPeriod SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - Supporting information "employmentImpacted" requires the period during which the employment was impacted

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - If ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="lab-test" then ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.code.coding.system SHALL exist and MUST refer to "http://loinc.org" and ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.code.coding.code SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - Supporting information "lab-test" requires a valid LOINC code

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - If ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="lab-test" then ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.valueQuantity SHALL exist and SHALL use a value specified in the system="http://unitsofmeasure.org"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - Supporting information "lab-test" requires the UCUM code-system and a value specified in the UCUM code-system

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - If ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="reason-for-visit" then ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.code.coding.system SHALL exist and MUST refer to the system  ="http://nphies.sa/terminology/CodeSystem/visit-reason" and the ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.code.coding.code SHALL exist
