Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - Supporting information "reason-for-visit" requires a value from the specified NPHIES CodeSystem mentioning the reason for the visit

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - If ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="days-supply" then ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.valueQuantity SHALL exist and SHALL use a value specified in the system="http://unitsofmeasure.org"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - Supporting information "days-supply" requires the number of days, the UCUM code system and the UCUM code “d”

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - If ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="vital-sign-weight"  and ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.valueQuantity exist then the ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.valueQuantity.system SHALL refer to "http://unitsofmeasure.org" and SHALL use code=kg
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - If Supporting information is "vital-sign-weight" and valueQuantity exist then it should use "kg" code from UCUM

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - If ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="vital-sign-systolic"  and ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.valueQuantity exist then the ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.valueQuantity.system SHALL refer to "http://unitsofmeasure.org" and SHALL  use code=mm[Hg]
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - if Supporting information is "vital-sign-systolic" and valueQuantity exist then it should use "mm[Hg]" code from UCUM

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - If ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="vital-sign-diastolic"  and ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.valueQuantity exist then the ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.valueQuantity.system SHALL refer to "http://unitsofmeasure.org" and SHALL  use code=mm[Hg]
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - if Supporting information is "vital-sign-diastolic" and valueQuantity exist then it should use "mm[Hg]" code from UCUM

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - If ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="vital-sign-height"  and ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.valueQuantity exist then the ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.valueQuantity.system SHALL refer to "http://unitsofmeasure.org" and SHALL use code=cm
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - if Supporting information is "vital-sign-height" and valueQuantity exist then it should use "cm" code from UCUM

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - If ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="icu-hours" then ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.valueQuantity SHALL exist and ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.valueQuantity.system SHALL refer to "http://unitsofmeasure.org" and SHALL use code= h
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - Supporting information "icu-hours" requires a value, the UCUM code-system and the UCUM code "h"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - If ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="ventilation-hours" then ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.valueQuantity SHALL exist and ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.valueQuantity.system SHALL refer to "http://unitsofmeasure.org" and SHALL  use code= h
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - Supporting information "ventilation-hours" requires a value, the UCUM code-system and the UCUM code "h"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - If ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="onset" then ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.code.coding.system SHALL exist and MUST refer to “http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icd-10-am” and ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.code.coding.code MUST exist and ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.timingDate SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - Supporting information "onset" requires the starting date and the ICD 10 code for the symptoms / illness

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description:
Advanced preauthorization - If ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="chief-complaint" then for one array entry in ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.code.coding the  ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.code.coding.system SHALL exist and 
MUST refer to "http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icd-10-am" 
and ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.code.coding.code MUST exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - Supporting information "chief-complaint" requires the ICD 10 code for the symptoms / illness if a code is supplied

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - if ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="temperature"  and ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.valueQuantity exist then the ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.valueQuantity.system SHALL refer to "http://unitsofmeasure.org" and SHALL  use code=cel
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - if Supporting information is "temperature" and valueQuantity exist then it should use "Cel" code from UCUM

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - If ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="pulse"  and ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.valueQuantity exist then the ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.valueQuantity.system SHALL refer to "http://unitsofmeasure.org" and SHALL  use code=/min
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - if Supporting information is "pulse" and valueQuantity exist then it should use "/min" code from UCUM

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - If ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="oxygen-saturation"  and ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.valueQuantity exist then the ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.valueQuantity.system SHALL refer to "http://unitsofmeasure.org" and SHALL  use code=%
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - if Supporting information is "oxygen-saturation" and valueQuantity exist then it should use "%" code from UCUM

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - If ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="respiratory-rate"  and ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.valueQuantity exist then the ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.valueQuantity.system SHALL refer to "http://unitsofmeasure.org" and SHALL  use code=/min
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - if Supporting information is "respiratory-rate" and valueQuantity exist then it should use "/min" code from UCUM

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="last-menstrual-period" then ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.timingDate SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - Supporting information "last-menstrual-period" requires the date of start of last menstrual period.

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="birth-weight" then ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.valueQuantity SHALL exist and ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.valueQuantity.system SHALL refer to "http://unitsofmeasure.org" and SHALL  use code=kg
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - Supporting information "birth-weight" requires a value, the UCUM code-system and the UCUM code "kg"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.category.code.coding is not "chief-complaint" and ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.code exists then ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.code.coding SHALL be provided
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - If supportingInfo code element is provided and the category is not "chief-complaint" then a code is required

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.category.code.coding="chief-complaint"then ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.code SHALL be provided
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - The supportingInfo code element is required if supportingInfo category is “chief-complaint”

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - There SHALL be exactly one principal diagnosis provided
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - One and only one principal diagnosis is required

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - Same diagnosis SHALL be unique per Claim
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - Diagnosis is not unique in the claim response

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preAuthorization - ClaimResponse.status SHALL use the fixed value "active"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preAuthorization - ClaimResponse status is not using the specified value "active"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse.subtype SHALL be  "OP" when ClaimResponse.type="Professional"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse subtype is using an incorrect value when ClaimResponse type is "Professional"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse.subtype SHALL be  "OP" when ClaimResponse.type="oral"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse subtype is using an incorrect value when ClaimResponse type is "Dental"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse.subtype SHALL be  "OP" when ClaimResponse.type="Vision"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse subtype is using an incorrect value when ClaimResponse type is "Vision"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse.subtype SHALL be  "OP" when ClaimResponse.type="Pharmacy"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse subtype is using an incorrect value when ClaimResponse type is "Pharmacy"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - If ClaimResponse.insurance contains more than one insurances, then one and only one of those insurances SHALL have ClaimResponse.insurance.focal =“true”
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - ClaimResponse insurance focal usage is incorrect when multiple ClaimResponse insurances are used

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - ClaimResponse.extension.diagnosis.sequence SHALL be unique within the claim response
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - ClaimResponse diagnosis sequence value is not unique within the claim response

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - The ClaimResponse.addItem.subSite SHALL not be allowed if the ClaimResponse.addItem.bodySite is not provided
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - The subSite shall not be allowed if the bodySite is not provided

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - ClaimResponse.addItem.detail.extension.sequence in the advanced preauthorization SHALL be unique within the same advanced preauthorization response
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - ClaimResponse addItem detail sequence value is not unique within the advanced preauthorization

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - ClaimResponse.addItem.detail.subdetail.extension.sequence in the advanced preauthorization SHALL be unique within the same advanced preauthorization response
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - ClaimResponse addItem detail subdetail sequence value is not unique within the advanced preauthorization

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - ClaimResponse.addItem.extension.sequence in the advanced preauthorization SHALL be unique within the advanced preauthorization response
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - ClaimResponse addItem Sequence value is not unique within the advanced preauthorization

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - ClaimResponse.addItem.extension.diagnosisSequence  SHALL match an existing   ClaimResponse.extension.diagnosis.sequence within the same advanced preauthorization response
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - the diagnosisSequence does not match an existing diagnosis sequence entry within the same advanced preauthorization response

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization – one and only one ClaimResponse.addItem.detail.productOrService SHALL be a valid code from "http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/dental-billing" adopted by nphies if ClaimResponse.type="oral"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization – one and only one ClaimResponse addItem detail productOrService SHALL be a valid code from "http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/dental-billing" adopted by nphies if ClaimResponse type="oral"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization – one and only one ClaimResponse addItem detail productOrService SHALL be a valid code from "http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/professional-billing" adopted by nphies if ClaimResponse type="professional"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization – one and only one ClaimResponse addItem detail productOrService SHALL be a valid code from "http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/vision-billing" adopted by nphies if ClaimResponse type="vision"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization – one and only one ClaimResponse addItem detail subdetail productOrService SHALL be a valid code from "http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/dental-billing" adopted by nphies if ClaimResponse type="oral"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization – one and only one ClaimResponse addItem detail subdetail productOrService SHALL be a valid code from "http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/pharmacy-billing" adopted by nphies if ClaimResponse type="pharmacy"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization – one and only one ClaimResponse addItem detail subdetail productOrService SHALL be a valid code from "http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/professional-billing" adopted by nphies if ClaimResponse type="professional"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization – one and only one ClaimResponse addItem detail subdetail productOrService SHALL be a valid code from "http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/vision-billing" adopted by nphies if ClaimResponse type="vision"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization – one and only one ClaimResponse addItem productOrService SHALL be a valid code from "http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/dental-billing" adopted by nphies if ClaimResponse type="oral"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization – one and only one ClaimResponse addItem productOrService SHALL be a valid code from "http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/institutional-billing" adopted by nphies if ClaimResponse type="institutional"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization – one and only one ClaimResponse addItem productOrService SHALL be a valid code from "http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/professional-billing" adopted by nphies if ClaimResponse type="professional"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization – one and only one ClaimResponse addItem productOrService SHALL be a valid code from "http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/vision-billing" adopted by nphies if ClaimResponse type="vision"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: When ClaimResponse.type is = "institutional" then ClaimResponse.addItem.bodySite SHALL have a value from the ValueSet "http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/institutional-body-site"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: When the ClaimResponse type is institutional then the ClaimResponse bodySite must use a code from the ValueSet as specified in the profile

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: When ClaimResponse.type is = "professional" then ClaimResponse.addItem.bodySite SHALL have a value from the ValueSet "http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/institutional-body-site"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: When the ClaimResponse type is professional then the ClaimResponse bodySite must use a code from the ValueSet as specified in the profile

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: When ClaimResponse.type is = "pharmacy" then ClaimResponse.addItem.bodySite SHALL have a value from the ValueSet "http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/institutional-body-site"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: When the ClaimResponse type is pharmacy then the ClaimResponse bodySite must use a code from the ValueSet as specified in the profile

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: When ClaimResponse.type is = "vision" then ClaimResponse.addItem.bodySite SHALL have a value from the ValueSet "http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/institutional-body-site"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: When the ClaimResponse type is vision then the ClaimResponse bodySite must use a code from the ValueSet as specified in the profile

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: When ClaimResponse.type is = "oral" then ClaimResponse.addItem.bodySite SHALL have a value from the ValueSet "http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/fdi-oral-region"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: When the ClaimResponse type is oral then the ClaimResponse bodySite must use a code from the ValueSet as specified in the profile

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: When ClaimResponse.type is = "institutional" then ClaimResponse.addItem.subSite SHALL have a value from the ValueSet "http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/subsite"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: When the ClaimResponse type is institutional then the ClaimResponse subSite must use a code from the ValueSet as specified in the profile

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: When ClaimResponse.type is = "professional" then ClaimResponse.addItem.subSite SHALL have a value from the ValueSet "http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/subsite"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: When the ClaimResponse type is professional then the ClaimResponse subSite must use a code from the ValueSet as specified in the profile

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: When ClaimResponse.type is = "pharmacy" then ClaimResponse.addItem.subSite SHALL have a value from the ValueSet "http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/subsite"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: When the ClaimResponse type is pharmacy then the ClaimResponse subSite must use a code from the ValueSet as specified in the profile

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: When ClaimResponse.type is = "vision" then ClaimResponse.addItem.subSite SHALL have a value from the ValueSet "http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/subsite"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: When the ClaimResponse type is vision then the ClaimResponse subSite must use a code from the ValueSet as specified in the profile

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: When ClaimResponse.type is = "oral" then ClaimResponse.addItem.subSite SHALL have a value from the ValueSet "http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/fdi-tooth-surface"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: When the ClaimResponse type is oral then the ClaimResponse subSite must use a code from the ValueSet as specified in the profile

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: When MessageHeader.eventCoding="advanced-authorization" then MessageHeader.response SHALL NOT be provided
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The MessageHeader response element must not be used in an advanced preauthorziation response

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse.subtype SHALL be one of ("IP", "EMR") when ClaimResponse.type="Institutional"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse subtype can be either "IP" or "EMR" only when ClaimResponse type is "institutional"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.sequence SHALL be unique within the claim response
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - ClaimResponse supportingInfo sequence value is not unique within the claim response

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - ClaimResponse.addItem.extension.informationSequence SHALL match an existing ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.sequence within the same advanced preauthorization
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - the informationSequence does not match an existing supportingInfo sequence entry within the same advanced preauthorization

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preAuthorization- When ClaimResponse.addItem.extension.adjudication-outcome="partial" ClaimResponse.addItem.adjudication-reason SHALL be provided
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preAuthorization - ClaimResponse addItem adjudication-reason is required when ClaimResponse addItem outcome is "partial"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: When Claim.item.extension.medicationRequest.dosageInstruction.dosage.timing.repeat.frequency is used then Claim.item.extension.dosageInstruction.dosage.timing.repeat.periodUnit and Claim.item.extension.medicationRequest.dosageInstruction.dosage.timing.repeat.period SHALL be provided
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: When Claim item dosageInstruction dosage timing repeat frequency is used then Claim item dosageInstruction dosage timing repeat period and Claim item dosageInstruction dosage timing repeat periodUnit fields are required

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Only one claim response with outcome= "complete" SHALL be sent to a prescription transaction
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Only one claim response with outcome= complete SHALL be sent to a prescription transaction

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: prescription request - Claim.item.extension.medicationRequest.dosageInstruction.dosage.sequence SHALL be unique
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The dosage sequence must be unique in a prescription request

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: When  MessageHeader.eventCoding="prescriber-response"  then one and only one of the  ClaimResponse.item.adjudication.category value SHALL be "approved-duration"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: When used in a prescriber authorization response, one and only one ClaimResponse item adjudication category   "approved-duration" SHALL exist

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.subType SHALL be only "op"  when MessageHeader.eventCoding="prescriber-request"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Claim.subType SHALL be only "op"  in a prescriber request

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: The "days-supply" (ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.category= "days-supply" ) SHALL be mandatory if the ClaimResponse.addItem.productOrService codesystem = "http://nphies.sa/terminology/CodeSystem/medication-codes" and the ClaimResponse.type="pharmacy" and when used for ClaimResponse.use="preauthorization"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Claim Response supportingInfo category is not "days-supply" when medication code is used in a or "pharmacy" Advanced Authorization

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: One and only one ClaimResponse.addItem.extension.informationSequence where the corresponding ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.category= "days-supply" SHALL be mandatory if the ClaimResponse.addItem.productOrService codesystem = "http://nphies.sa/terminology/CodeSystem/medication-codes"  and the ClaimResponse.type="pharmacy" and when used for ClaimResponse.use="preauthorization"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Claim response addItem informationSequence related to "day-supply" category is not provided or provided more than once when medication code is used in a "pharmacy" Advanced Authorization

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preAuthorization- If every ClaimResponse.addItem.extension.adjudication-outcome=”approved” then ClaimResponse.extension.adjudication-outcome SHALL be “approved”
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse adjudication-outcome is using incorrect value when every ClaimResponse addItem adjudication-outcome is "approved"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preAuthorization-ClaimResponse.addItem.extension.adjudication-outcome SHALL be only one of ("approved", "partial") when ClaimResponse.outcome="complete"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse item adjudication outcome can be only "approved" or "partial" when outcome is "Complete"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preAuthorization- If one of ClaimResponse.addItem.extension.adjudication-outcome=”partial” then ClaimResponse.extension.adjudication-outcome SHALL be “partial”
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse adjudication-outcome SHALL be partial when one of ClaimResponse addItem adjudication-outcome is "partial"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse.total SHALL not be used if ClaimResponse.extension.reissue-reason = "cancel" is used
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse total SHALL not be used if reissue-reason is "cancel"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Cancelled advanced Authorization by provider cannot have a new related advanced Authorization
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Cancelled advanced Authorization by provider cannot have a new related advanced Authorization

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Cancelled advanced Authorization by payer cannot have a new related advanced Authorization
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Cancelled advanced Authorization by payer cannot have a new related advanced Authorization

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse.preAuthRef SHALL be corresponding to an existing PreAuthRef issued in a previous advanced authorization from the same Payer to the same patient and provider when reissue-reason is "cancel"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Cancel advanced authrization from payer SHALL include an existing  PreauthRef previously issued by the payer for the same patient and provider.

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: When ClaimResponse.extension.reissue-reason is "cancel", then ClaimResponse.extension.adjudication-outcome and ClaimResponse.addItem SHALL not be used
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Adjudication-outcome and addItem SHALL not be used when sending cancel advanced Authorization

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Only one of ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.valueBoolean, ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.valueString or ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.valueQuantity SHALL exist when ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.value[x] is used
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Only one of valueBoolean, valueString or valueQuantity can be used when supportinginfo value is used

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: HCP cannot cancel a cancelled advanced authorization from HIC or HCP
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: HCP cannot cancel a cancelled advanced authorization from HIC or HCP

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: advanced Authorization- If ClaimResponse.extension.reissue-reason is used, then ClaimResponse.preAuthRef SHALL correspond to an exiting preAuthRef from same payer to same provider and same patient
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Reissue reason SHALL be used with an existing PreauthRef from the same payer to the same provider and patient

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse.preAuthRef SHALL be unique from the same payer to the same provider if no reissue reason is used
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse.preAuthRef SHALL be unique from the same payer to the same provider if no reissue reason is used

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.extension.priorauthResponse SHALL not include a cancelled advanced Authorization
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Claim.extension.priorauthResponse SHALL not include a cancelled advanced Authorization

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.type SHALL be only "professional"  when MessageHeader.eventCoding="prescriber-request"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Claim.type SHALL be only "professional"  in a prescription request

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.item.detail.productOrService SHALL be same as MedicationRequest.medicationCodeableConcept code
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ProductOrservice and medication request  detail code under item detail SHALL be the same

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.item.detail.subdetail.productOrService SHALL be same as MedicationRequest.medicationCodeableConcept code
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ProductOrservice and medication request subdetail  code under item subdetail SHALL be the same

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Only one Claim.item.informationSequence referencing to "days-supply" can  be added per item if  MessageHeader.eventCoding="prescriber-request"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Only one Claim.item.informationSequence referencing to "days-supply"  supporting info  can be added per item in precription request

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If MessageHeader.eventCoding="prescriber-request"  Claim.item.extension.absenceOfScientificCode SHALL be present when  Claim.item.productOrService.coding.system ="http://nphies.sa/terminology/CodeSystem/medication-codes"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Claim item absenceOfScientificCode SHALL be present when  Claim item productOrService coding system ="http://nphies sa/terminology/CodeSystem/medication-codes"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.item.extension.absenceOfScientificCode.coding.text SHALL be present when Claim.item.extension.absenceOfScientificCode.coding.code="others"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Claim item absenceOfScientificCode coding text SHALL be present when Claim item absenceOfScientificCode coding code="others"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: MedicationRequest.authoredOn SHALL be on or before the creation date of the associated prescriber authorization request
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: MedicationRequest authoredOn SHALL be on or before the creation date of the associated prescriber authorization request

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: When MessageHeader.eventCoding="prescriber-response" and Dosage.timing.repeat.count was provided in the corresponding prescriber authorization then ClaimResponse.item.adjudication.category="approved-refill" SHALL be provided
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: When repeat count was provided in the corresponding prescriber authorization then the prescriber response shall contain "approved-refill"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: MedicationRequest.medicationCodeableConcept.coding.code SHALL use the same code as provided in Claim.item.productOrService.coding.code
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The medication code in a medication request should match the associated productOrService item.

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: MedicationRequest.status SHALL be "active"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: MedicationRequest.status SHALL be "active"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: MedicationRequest.intent SHALL be "order"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: MedicationRequest.intent SHALL be "order"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: MedicationRequest.subject SHALL use a reference to the same Claim.patient in prescription request
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: MedicationRequest.subject SHALL use a reference to the same Claim.patient in prescription request

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.item.extension.prescribedMedication SHALL be present if Claim.item.productOrService if from  http://nphies.sa/terminology/CodeSystem/medication-codes code list
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: prescribedMedication SHALL be present if productOrService if from  http://nphies.sa/terminology/CodeSystem/medication-codes code list

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.item.extension.pharmacistSelectionReason  SHALL be present if Claim.item.productOrService if from http://nphies.sa/terminology/CodeSystem/medication-codes code list
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: pharmacistSelectionReason  SHALL be present if productOrService if from  http://nphies.sa/terminology/CodeSystem/medication-codes code list

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.item.detail.extension.prescribedMedication  SHALL be present if Claim.item.detail.productOrService if from  http://nphies.sa/terminology/CodeSystem/medication-codes code list
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: prescribedMedication  SHALL be present detail.productOrService if from  http://nphies.sa/terminology/CodeSystem/medication-codes code list

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.item.detail.extension.pharmacistSelectionReason  SHALL be present if Claim.item.detail.productOrService if from  http://nphies.sa/terminology/CodeSystem/medication-codes code list
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: pharmacistSelectionReason  SHALL be present if detail.productOrService if from  http://nphies.sa/terminology/CodeSystem/medication-codes code list

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: MedicationRequest.requester SHALL be same as Claim.careTeam.provider in the related prescription request
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Care team and requester SHALL be same practitioner license in prescription request

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: When MessageHeader.eventCoding="prescriber-response" then ClaimResponse.outcome SHALL NOT be "partial"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse outcome cannot be "partial" in a prescription response

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: When MessageHeader.eventCoding="prescriber-response" then ClaimResponse.extension.adjudication-outcome SHALL NOT be "not-required"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse adjudication outcome cannot be "not-required" in a prescription response

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.item.detail.extension.pharmacistSubstitute.coding.text SHALL be present when Claim.item.detail.extension.pharmacistSubstitute.coding.code="others"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Claim  detail pharmacistSubstitute text SHALL be present when  pharmacistSubstitute  code is"others"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.item.extension.pharmacistSubstitute.coding.text SHALL be present when Claim.item.extension.pharmacistSubstitute.coding.code="others"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: pharmacistSubstitute text SHALL be present when  pharmacistSubstitute  code is"others"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: MedicationRequest.identifier SHALL be unique within the same transaction
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: MedicationRequest.identifier SHALL be unique within the same transaction

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.item.detail.extension.absenceOfScientificCode.coding.text SHALL be present when Claim.item.detail.extension.absenceOfScientificCode.coding.code="others"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Claim detail absenceOfScientificCode coding text SHALL be present when Claim detail absenceOfScientificCode coding code="others"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.item.detail.subdetail.extension.absenceOfScientificCode.coding.text SHALL be present when Claim.item.detail.subdetail.extension.absenceOfScientificCode.coding.code="others"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Claim subdetail absenceOfScientificCode coding text SHALL be present when Claim subdetail absenceOfScientificCode coding code="others"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.item.diagnosisSequence SHALL be required if Claim.item.productOrService is from http://nphies.sa/terminology/CodeSystem/medication-codes code list and the Claim.type="pharmacy" and when used for Claim.use="preauthorization" or "claim"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Claim item diagnosisSequence is not provided when productOrService is a medication code

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Only one Dosage.timing.repeat.count SHALL exist per Claim.item.productOrService.
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Only one refill  SHALL exist per productOrService.

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.related.claim SHALL refer to an existing claim in nphies for the same payer and from the same provider
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: related claim SHALL refer to an existing claim in nphies for the same payer and from the same provider

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Encounter.class = "SS" OR "IMP", then Encounter.hospitalization.admitSource SHALL be provided
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: If Encounter.class =  "Inpatient Encounter" or "Day Case Admission" Then Encounter.hospitalization.admitSource SHALL be provided

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Encounter.extension.emergencyDepartmentDisposition SHALL be provided when Encounter.class ="EMER" and claim.use= "claim" and encounter.period.end is provided
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Emergency Department Disposition SHALL be provided in claim when Encounter is emergency and encounter end date is provided

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: One and only one coverage.class.type = "plan"  SHALL be provided per coverage resource
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: One and only one coverage.class.type = "plan"  SHALL be provided per coverage resource

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If claim.use="claim",  claim.type="institutional"  and one of Claim.productOrService is : "13882-00-00" or  13882-01-00"or  13882-02-00 or 92211-00-00 Then Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="ventilation-hours" SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Ventilation Hours Shall be provided in Institutional claim that contain one of the following items "13882-00-00" or "13882-01-00" or "13882-02-00" or "92211-00-00"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Encounter.extension.emergencyArrivalCode SHALL be provided when Encounter.class ="EMER" and claim.use= "claim"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Encounter Emergency Arrival code SHALL be provided for emergency claims

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Encounter.extension.triageDate  SHALL be provided when Encounter.class ="EMER" and claim.use= "claim" or "preauthorization"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Encounter Triage date SHALL be provided for emergency authorizations and claims

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Encounter.extension.triageCategory SHALL be provided when Encounter.class ="EMER" and claim.use= "claim" or "preauthorization"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Encounter Triage Category SHALL be provided for emergency authorizations and claims

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Encounter.extension.emergencyServiceStart SHALL be provided when Encounter.class ="EMER" and claim.use= "claim"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Encounter Emergency Service start SHALL be provided for emergency claims

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Encounter.extension.serviceEventType SHALL be provided when claim.use= "claim" or "preauthorization", claim.type= "professional" or "oral"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Encounter Service Event Type  SHALL be provided for "professional" or "oral" claim and Authorization

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Encounter.hospitalization.extension.admissionSpecialty SHALL be provided when claim.use= "claim" and Encounter.class ="IMP" or "SS"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: "Encounter hospitalization admission Specialty"  SHALL be provided for claim with Inpatient Admission Encounter Class

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Encounter.extension.causeOfDeath SHALL be provided when  Encounter.hospitalization.dischargeDisposition= "died" and claim.use="claim"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Cause of Death SHALL be provided for claim with Hospitalization Discharge Disposition =  "Died"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.type= "Institutional" then encounter.class SHALL be either "IMP" or "SS" only
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Encounter Class Shall be either "Inpatient Admission" or "Day Case Admission" for Institutional Claim

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.type= "Professional" then encounter.class SHALL be either "EMER", "AMB", "HH" or "VR" only when claim.use="claim" or "preauthorization"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Encounter Class Shall be "Emergency" or "Home Care" or "Telemedicine"  or "Outpatient" for Professional Claim

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.type= "oral" then encounter.class SHALL be only "AMB"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Encounter Class Shall be "Outpatient" for "Oral" Claim Type

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Encounter.hospitalization.extension.intendedLengthOfStay SHALL be provided when encounter.class = IMP, SS and claim.use="claim"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Hospitalization Intended Length Of Stay SHALL be provided for claim with Inpatient Admission or DayCase Encounter Class

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If the "principal" or "secondary" diagnosis in  Claim.diagnosis[x].diagnosisCodeableConcept.coding.code belongs to "http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/morphology-diagnosis" and claim.use="claim" or "authorization" then Claim.supportingInfo.category.code.coding= "morphology" SHALL be provided
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: If principal or secondary diagnosis in a claim or authorization belongs to morphology diagnosis list then supporting info "morphology" SHALL be provided.

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.accident with claim.accident.type = "WPA" SHALL exist if at least one diagnosis code is from the work related diagnosis list "http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/work-related-diagnosis" when claim.use="claim" or "preauthorization"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Work related accident SHALL be provided when the diagnosis is from the  work related diagnosis list

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: At least one diagnosis code from the work related diagnosis list  "http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/work-related-diagnosis" SHALL exist when claim.accident.types is "WPA"  and claim.use="claim" or "preauthorization"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Work related diagnosis SHALL be Provided for Workplace accident

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.type="oral" then  Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code "chief-complaint" SHALL be provided.
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Chief Complaint Shall be Provided in Supporting info of Oral Authorization or Claim

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.supportingInfo.category ="investigation-result" is required when claim.use="claim" or "authorization"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Investigation Result Shall be Provided in Supporting info of Authorization or Claim

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.supportingInfo.code.text is required when Claim.supportingInfo.category= "investigation-result" and Claim.supportingInfo.code.code ="other"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Investigation Result "Text" Shall be Provided when Investigation Result Supporting info is selected with Code = "Other"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: encounter.class SHALL be only "EMER" when claim.subtype = "EMR"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Emergency Claim Subtype Shall only use Emergency Encounter Class

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Claim.accident with claim.accident.type = "MVA" SHALL exist if at least one diagnosis code is from the RTA diagnosis list ( http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/rta-diagnosis) when claim.use="claim" or "preauthorization"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Vehicle accident SHALL be provided when the diagnosis is from the  RTA diagnosis list

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: At least one diagnosis code from the RTA diagnosis list   ( http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/rta-diagnosis )SHALL exist when when claim.accident.types is "MVA" and  claim.use="claim" or "preauthorization"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: RTA diagnosis SHALL be Provided for Motor vehicle accident

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Encounter.hospitalization.extension.dischargeSpecialty SHALL be provided when claim.use="claim",encounter.type ="IMP or "SS" and encounter.period.end is provided
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Discharge Specialty SHALL be provided in institutional claim when encounter end date is provided

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Encounter.hospitalization.dischargeDisposition SHALL be provided when claim.use="claim", encounter.type ="IMP or "SS" and encounter.period.end is provided
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Discharge Disposition SHALL be provided in institutional claim when encountered date is provided

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Encounter.extension.emergencyServiceStart SHALL be on or after the encounter.period.start
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Encounter Emergency Service Start date  SHALL be on or after the Encounter Period Start Date

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Encounter.subject SHALL be same as claim.patient
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Encounter subject SHALL be same as claim patient

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Encounter.serviceProvider SHALL be same as Claim.provider
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Encounter serviceProvider SHALL be same as Claim provider

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If claim.use is "claim" or "authorization" and claim.type="institutional" then  Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code "vital-sign-diastolic" SHALL be provided.
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Diastolic SHALL be provided in institutional claim or authorization

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If claim.use is "claim" or "authorization" and claim.type="institutional" then  Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code "vital-sign-systolic" SHALL be provided.
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Systolic SHALL be provided in institutional claim or authorization

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If  claim.use is "claim" or "authorization"  and claim.type="institutional" then  Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code "pulse" SHALL be provided.
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Pulse SHALL be provided in institutional claim or authorization

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If  claim.use is "claim" or "authorization"  and claim.type="institutional"  then  Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code "temperature" SHALL be provided.
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Temperature SHALL be provided in institutional claim or authorization

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If claim.use is "claim" or "authorization" and claim.type="institutional" then  Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code "vital-sign-height" SHALL be provided.
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Height SHALL be provided in institutional claim or authorization

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If claim.use is "claim" or "authorization" and claim.type="institutional" then  Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code "respiratory-rate" SHALL be provided.
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Respiratory Rate SHALL be provided in institutional claim or authorization

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If claim.use is "claim" or "authorization" and claim.type="institutional" then  Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code "vital-sign-weight" SHALL be provided.
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Weight SHALL be provided in institutional claim or authorization

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If claim.use is "claim" or "authorization" and claim.type="institutional" then  Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code "chief-complaint" SHALL be provided.
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Chief Complaint SHALL be provided in institutional claim or authorization

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If claim.use is "claim" or "authorization" and claim.type="institutional" then  Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code "oxygen-saturation" SHALL be provided.
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Oxygen Saturation SHALL be provided in institutional claim or authorization

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If claim.use is "claim" or "authorization" and claim.type="professional" then  Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code "vital-sign-diastolic" SHALL be provided.
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Diastolic SHALL be provided in professional claim or authorization

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If claim.use is "claim" or "authorization" and claim.type="professional" then  Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code "vital-sign-systolic" SHALL be provided.
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Systolic SHALL be provided in professional claim or authorization

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If  claim.use is "claim" or "authorization"  and claim.type="professional" then  Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code "pulse" SHALL be provided.
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Pulse SHALL be provided in professional claim or authorization

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If  claim.use is "claim" or "authorization"  and claim.type="professional"  then  Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code "temperature" SHALL be provided.
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Temperature SHALL be provided in professional claim or authorization

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If claim.use is "claim" or "authorization" and claim.type="professional" then  Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code "vital-sign-height" SHALL be provided.
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Height SHALL be provided in professional claim or authorization

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If claim.use is "claim" or "authorization" and claim.type="professional" then  Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code "respiratory-rate" SHALL be provided.
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Respiratory Rate SHALL be provided in professional claim or authorization

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If claim.use is "claim" or "authorization" and claim.type="professional" then  Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code "vital-sign-weight" SHALL be provided.
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Weight SHALL be provided in professional claim or authorization

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If claim.use is "claim" or "authorization" and claim.type="professional" then  Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code "chief-complaint" SHALL be provided.
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Chief Complaint SHALL be provided in professional claim or authorization

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If claim.use is "claim" or "authorization" and claim.type="professional" then  Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code "oxygen-saturation" SHALL be provided.
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Oxygen Saturation SHALL be provided in professional claim or authorization

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="morphology" then Claim.supportingInfo.code.coding.system SHALL exist and MUST refer to “http://nphies.sa/terminology/CodeSystem/morphology-code” and Claim.supportingInfo.code.coding.code MUST exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Supporting information "morphology" requires a value from the specified NPHIES CodeSystem mentioning the morphology

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="treatment-plan" then Claim.supportingInfo.valueString SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Supporting information "treatment-plan" requires textual information

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="patient-history" then Claim.supportingInfo.valueString SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Supporting information "patient-history" requires textual information

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="physical-examination" then Claim.supportingInfo.valueString SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Supporting information "physical-examination" requires textual information

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="history-of-present-illness" then Claim.supportingInfo.valueString SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Supporting information "history-of-present-illness" requires textual information

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="investigation-result" then Claim.supportingInfo.code.coding.system SHALL exist and MUST refer to “http://nphies.sa/terminology/CodeSystem/investigation-result” and Claim.supportingInfo.code.coding.code MUST exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Supporting information "investigation-result" requires a value from the specified NPHIES CodeSystem mentioning the investigation-result

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="admission-weight" then Claim.supportingInfo.valueQuantity SHALL exist and Claim.supportingInfo.valueQuantity.system SHALL refer to "http://unitsofmeasure.org" and SHALL use code=kg
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: If Supporting information is "admission-weight" then valueQuantity SHALL exist and use "kg" code from UCUM system

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="estimated-Length-of-Stay" then Claim.supportingInfo.valueQuantity SHALL exist and Claim.supportingInfo.valueQuantity.system SHALL refer to "http://unitsofmeasure.org" and SHALL use code=d
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: If Supporting information is "estimated-Length-of-Stay" then valueQuantity SHALL exist and use "d" code from UCUM system

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - If ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="morphology" then ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.code.coding.system SHALL exist and MUST refer to "http://nphies.sa/terminology/CodeSystem/morphology-code" and ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.code.coding.code SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - Supporting information "morphology" requires a valid morphology  code

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - If ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="treatment-plan" then ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.valueString SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - Supporting information "treatment-plan" requires textual information

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - If ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="patient-history" then ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.valueString SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - Supporting information "patient-history" requires textual information

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - If ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="physical-examination" then ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.valueString SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - Supporting information "physical-examination" requires textual information

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - If ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="history-of-present-illness" then ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.valueString SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - Supporting information "history-of-present-illnes" requires textual information

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - If ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="investigation-result" then ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.code.coding.system SHALL exist and MUST refer to "http://nphies.sa/terminology/CodeSystem/investigation-result" and ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.code.coding.code SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - Supporting information "investigation-result" requires a value from the specified NPHIES CodeSystem mentioning the investigation-result

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - If ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="admission-weight" then ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.valueQuantity SHALL exist and SHALL use a value specified in the system="http://unitsofmeasure.org" and ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.valueQuantity.code = "kg"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - Supporting information is "admission-weight" then valueQuantity SHALL exist and use "kg" code from UCUM system

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - If ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="estimated-Length-of-Stay" then ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.valueQuantity SHALL exist and SHALL use a value specified in the system="http://unitsofmeasure.org" and ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.valueQuantity.code = "d"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization - Supporting information is "estimated-Length-of-Stay" then valueQuantity SHALL exist and use "d" code from UCUM system

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Patient.identifier.value should start with 1 and has exact 10 digits, when Patient.type.code = "NI"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Patient Identifier shall consist of 10 digits starting with 1 when National ID used

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Patient.identifier.value should start with 2 and has exact 10 digits, when Patient.type.code = "PRC"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Patient Identifier shall consist of 10 digits starting with 2 when Iqama ID used

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse.subtype SHALL be  "OP" or "EMR" when ClaimResponse.type="Professional"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse subtype is using an incorrect value when ClaimResponse type is "Professional"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse.subtype SHALL be "IP" when ClaimResponse.type="Institutional"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: ClaimResponse subtype is using an incorrect value when ClaimResponse type is "institutional"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Encounter.period.end SHALL be provided when Encounter.hospitalization.dischargeDisposition exist when claim.use="claim", encounter.type ="IMP or "SS"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Encounter end date SHALL be provided when discharge disposition exist in institutional claim

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If claim.use is"authorization" and claim.type="institutional" then  Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code "estimated-length-of-stay" SHALL be provided.
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Estimated length of stay SHALL be provided in institutional authorization

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.use="claim" or "authorization" then, Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="treatment-plan" SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Supporting information "treatment plan" is required in claim and authorization.

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.use="claim" or "authorization" then, Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="patient-history" SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Supporting information "patient history" is required in claim and authorization.

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.use="claim" or "authorization" then, Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="physical-examination" SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Supporting information "physical examination" is required in claim and authorization.

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.use="claim" or "authorization" then, Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="history-of-present-illness" SHALL exist
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Supporting information "history of present illness" is required in claim and authorization.

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Encounter.class "IMP" and "SS" SHALL be used only when Claim.type is  "Institutional"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Encounter Class "Inpatient Admission" and "Day Case Admission" SHALL be used only when claim is "institutional

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Encounter.class "EMER", "HH" and "VR" SHALL be only used when claim.use="claim" or "preauthorization" and Claim.type= "Professional"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Encounter Class "Emergency" or "Home Care" or "Telemedicine" SHALL be used for Professional Claim and Authorization

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: if Claim.supportingInfo.category.code.coding="morphology" is provided, then at least one "principal" or "secondary" Claim.diagnosis[x].diagnosisCodeableConcept.coding.code belongs to "http://nphies.sa/terminology/ValueSet/morphology-diagnosis" shall be provided when claim.use="claim" or "authorization"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: if supporting info "morphology" is provided in an authorization or claim then at least one principal or secondary diagnosis SHALL be from "Morphology diagnosis list"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Encounter Class "Outpatient" SHALL be used only when claim is "oral" or "professional"

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="investigation-result" and  Claim.supportingInfo.code.coding.code = "IRA" then Claim.supportingInfo.valueAttachment shall be provided
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Supporting information "investigation-result" requires a attachment when attachment code is used

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Advanced preauthorization - If ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="investigation-result" and ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.code.coding.code = "IRA" then ClaimResponse.extension.supportingInfo.valueAttachment shall be provided
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Advanced preauthorization -Supporting information "investigation-result" requires a attachment when attachment code is used

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Patient.birthdate shall be on or before currentDate and after 1900-01-01
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Patient Birthdate Shall not be more than currentDate or before 1st Jan 1900

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: If encounter.class = "IMP" and claim.use = "claim" and the difference between encounter start date and birthdate is less than 365 days then Claim.supportingInfo.category.coding.code="admission-weight" shall exists
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: admission Weight Shall be provided in Inpatient Claims for patient age less 365 days

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Encounter.period.start shall be on or before current date when use = "claim"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Encounter start date cannot be in future in claims

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Patient.birthdate shall be on or before Encounter.period.start when encounter.period.start exists
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Encounter start date Shall be on or after Patient Birthdate

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Encounter.hospitalization.dischargeDisposition and Encounter.period.end SHALL be provided when claim.use="claim", encounter.class ="IMP or "SS" and Encounter.hospitalization.extension.dischargeSpecialty is provided
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Discharge Disposition and Encounter end Date SHALL be provided in claims with Inpatient or DayCase Admission Encounter Class when Discharge Specialty exists

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: ClaimResponse.insurance shall be provided when ClaimResponse.outcome = "compelete" when ClaimResponse.use="claim" or "preauthorization"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Insurance shall be provided for complete Claims and Authorization

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: if ClaimResponse.insurance exists then one and only one ClaimResponse.insurance.focal= "true" shall be provided when ClaimResponse.use="claim" or "preauthorization"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: One and only one focal Insurance Shall be provided for Claim and Authorization

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Encounter.extension.causeOfDeath SHALL be provided when Encounter.extension.emergencyDepartmentDisposition= "DED" or "DOA" and claim.use="claim"
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Cause of Death SHALL be provided for claim with Emergency Department Disposition =  "Died in ED" or "Dead on arrival"

A message must have a MessageHeader as the first resource
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: A message must have a MessageHeader as the first resource

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: CoverageEligibilityResponse.insurance.item : SHALL contain a category or a billcode but not both.|category.exists() xor productOrService.exists()|exists(f:category) or exists(f:productOrService)
Claim : If the resource is contained in another resource, it SHALL NOT contain nested Resources|contained.contained.empty()|not(parent::f:contained and f:contained)

Claim : If the resource is contained in another resource, it SHALL be referred to from elsewhere in the resource or SHALL refer to the containing resource|contained.where((('#'+id in (%resource.descendants().reference | %resource.descendants().as(canonical) | %resource.descendants().as(uri) | %resource.descendants().as(url))) or descendants().where(reference = '#').exists() or descendants().where(as(canonical) = '#').exists() or descendants().where(as(canonical) = '#').exists()).not()).trace('unmatched', id).empty()|not(exists(for $id in f:contained/*/f:id/@value return $contained[not(parent::*/descendant::f:reference/@value=concat('#', $contained/*/id/@value) or descendant::f:reference[@value='#'])]))

Claim : If a resource is contained in another resource, it SHALL NOT have a meta.versionId or a meta.lastUpdated|contained.meta.versionId.empty() and contained.meta.lastUpdated.empty()|not(exists(f:contained/*/f:meta/f:versionId)) and not(exists(f:contained/*/f:meta/f:lastUpdated))
Claim : If a resource is contained in another resource, it SHALL NOT have a security label|contained.meta.security.empty()|not(exists(f:contained/*/f:meta/f:security))
Claim : A resource  have narrative for robust management|text.`div`.exists()|exists(f:text/h:div)
Extension : Must have either extensions or value[x], not both|extension.exists() != value.exists()|exists(f:extension)!=exists(f:*[starts-with(local-name(.), 'value')])
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: An extension can have another extension or value, but not both

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Task : Last modified date must be greater than or equal to authored-on date.|lastModified.exists().not() or authoredOn.exists().not() or lastModified >= authoredOn|not(exists(f:lastModified/@value)) or not(exists(f:authoredOn/@value)) or f:lastModified/@value >= f:authoredOn/@value
Organization : The organization SHALL at least have a name or an identifier, and possibly more than one|(identifier.count() + name.count()) > 0|count(f:identifier | f:name) > 0
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: The organization requires a name or an identifier

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Organization.address : An address of an organization can never be of use 'home'|where(use = 'home').empty()|count(f:use[@value='home']) = 0
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Organization address cannot be a home address

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Organization.telecom : The telecom of an organization can never be of use 'home'|where(use = 'home').empty()|count(f:use[@value='home']) = 0
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Organization telecom cannot be of a home

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Patient.contact : SHALL at least contain a contact's details or a reference to an organization|name.exists() or telecom.exists() or address.exists() or organization.exists()|exists(f:name) or exists(f:telecom) or exists(f:address) or exists(f:organization)
Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Display: Patient contact details, when provided, must contain either a reference to an organization or one of the following (name, address, telecom)

Nphies Rules and Codes- OBA.Description: Identifier.period : If present, start SHALL have a lower value than end|start.hasValue().not() or end.hasValue().not() or (start <= end)|not(exists(f:start/@value)) or not(exists(f:end/@value)) or (xs:dateTime(f:start/@value) <= xs:dateTime(f:end/@value))

Identifier.assigner : SHALL have a contained resource if a local reference is provided|reference.startsWith('#').not() or (reference.substring(1).trace('url') in %rootResource.contained.id.trace('ids'))|not(starts-with(f:reference/@value, '#')) or exists(ancestor::*[self::f:entry or self::f:parameter]/f:resource/f:*/f:contained/f:*[f:id/@value=substring-after(current()/f:reference/@value, '#')]|/*/f:contained/f:*[f:id/@value=substring-after(current()/f:reference/@value, '#')])
Element SHALL exist in the base FHIR profile
